page.title: 17EDUCATION
page.content: In the area covered by this block i.e Elworth and part of Sandbach there are four primary schools.The four being:Elworth Church of England County Primary,Elworth Hall County Primary, Sandbach County Primary and,finally, Offley County Infant and Primary.The last of the four being split between two buildings but on the same site. All the four schools cater for the full primary age range i.e. from five to eleven years of age.At eleven the children move on to the two comprehensive schools in the area i.e. Sandbach High School (girls only) and Sandbach School (boys only). Prior to five years of age most of the children attend some kind of playgroup or play school.In this area there is no state nursery education at the present time.
